'''Evan Lang''' is a kid who was bought into the ER after being seriously burned in a hotel fire.

==History==
Evan was on a tour of colleges and stayed at a hotel in Seattle for the night. The hotel caught on fire and Evan sustained second and third-degree burns over 60% of his body. He was taken to the ER, where he was examined. He had no pulse in his arm, so they cut into the burned tissue to restore blood flow.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
In the trauma room, he asked for his dad.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was 16 at the time of the hotel fire.
*He liked UW, but wasn't sure he could take the rain.
